mapper.select: SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(8) */ * FROM ( SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(8) */ * FROM 결과지표_정류장별통행 WHERE 1=1 AND SDATE ='20210322' AND ANAL_AREA_CD ='31080' AND PROVIDER ='00' ) PIVOT ( SUM(STTN_BUS_GIN_AGG) STTN_BUS_GIN_AGG ,SUM(STTN_BUS_GFF_AGG) STTN_BUS_GFF_AGG ,SUM(STTN_BUS_TRS_AGG) STTN_BUS_TRS_AGG ,SUM(STTN_TRAIN_GIN_AGG) STTN_TRAIN_GIN_AGG ,SUM(STTN_TRAIN_GFF_AGG) STTN_TRAIN_GFF_AGG ,SUM(STTN_TRAIN_TRS_AGG) STTN_TRAIN_TRS_AGG FOR CD_NO IN ('01'일반 , '02'어린이, '03'청소년, '04'경로 ,'05'장애인 , '06' 국가유공자, '07' 다자녀부모, '08' 동반 ,'09' 대학생 , '10' 복지 , '11' 기타) ) ORDER BY STTN_NMA, TM
